com.cube.storm.ui.lib.spec

Interface DividerSpec

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ListDividerSpec

    public interface DividerSpec
    Specification interface used to creating dividers inbetween items in StormListAdapter.

    Use this interface along with UiSettings.setDividerSpec(DividerSpec) to change the default spec. Currently defaults to ListDividerSpec which will only display a divider in between List objects (but not the last one in the list) and in between StandardListItem objects.

    The default divider used is Divider, you can implement your own by adding it to your overridden com.cube.storm.ui.lib.factory.ViewFactory and returning it in your overridden DividerSpec.
